title: Ultra-moist chocolate cake
ingredients: ['300g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 eggs', '250ml milk', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '45g unsweetened cocoa', '250ml hot water', '315g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '115g unsalted butter']
